attributes.action: Lower the cost of flights and holidays abroad during school holidays ...
attributes.additional_details: Flight charges treble in school holidays.. WHY ? Sometimes forcing some family to talk their children out of school during term times... Doing this then gives them a considerable fine for doing so...
attributes.background: Insist on the charges being cut...

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700540
